text: Elkann is a French-Jewish surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Alain Elkann (born 1950), an Italian novelist and journalist of Jewish descent, with French and American lineage *Ginevra Elkann (born 1979), an apprentice film director, granddaughter of Gianni Agnelli *John Elkann (born 1976), an Italian industrialist, grandson of the late Gianni Agnelli, heir to the automaker Fiat *Lapo Elkann (born 1977), a New York-born Italian industrialist, former marketing manager == See also == * Elkan, a surname and given name
title: Elkann
